name: House of Lashes Iconic False Eyelashes
about: What it is:An eco-conscious and cruelty-free false lash collection that features House of Lashes' bestselling Iconic false lashes in Iconic, Iconic Lite, and Iconic Mini..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:The lash with a name that says it all: Iconic lashes will transform any look from natural- or soft-glam to all-out glam. Whether you want the original and full style, Iconic, the more natural version, Iconic Lite, or the pair customized for smaller eyes, Iconic Mini, thereu2019s an Iconic lash for all looks and eye shapes.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.For beginners:.-Measure the false eyelash band against your lash line and trim the band with scissors if needed..-Gently bend the band into a 'U' shape to help it conform to your eye shape..-Gently curl your natural lashes and apply mascara to create a base..-Coat the false eyelash band with lash glue and allow it to sit for 40+ seconds (Major tip: Wait for the glue to become tacky before applying the lashes for better adhesion)..-Use a lash applicator or tweezers to carefully place the false eyelash onto the center of your upper lash line. .-Adjust the inner and outer corners of the false eyelash..-For a more seamless look, gently pinch the lash band and your natural lash line together to secure the application. ...Tips and tricks:.-Apply mascara prior to applying false eyelashes. This helps blend your lashes together and prevents product buildup to extend the life of your false eyelashes..-For a more seamless look, gently pinch the lash band and your natural lashes together..-Clean false eyelashes after three to four wears. Use your favorite makeup remover and a Q-tip to gently swab the false eyelashes and band. Gently remove any excess lash glue with tweezers or your fingers. .-Store false eyelashes in their original tray to preserve their shape and keep them clean. .-Caution: Use only as directed. Apply the glue only to the false eyelashes band and apply the lash band to your eyelid above your lash line. Do not apply the glue or lash band directly to your natural eyelashes.

reviews.review_title: What happened to beloved Iconic lashes?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok maybe I just got a lemon of a pair but from what I remember these are not like the Iconic lashes I knew and loved- these are stiff and straight and very long strips, I never used to have to trim them now I do! I don't know I'll try them again maybe but I used to love them!!! These were a huge letdown ud83dude1e

reviews.review_text: I donu2019t know if I will get this item but if it is sold out after I bought it how do I get refund back

reviews.review_title: They are MINI not the actual Iconic set.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On the title it says u201cHouse of Lashes Iconicu201d it does not state itu2019s a mini lash set. Iu2019ve own a few lashes from u201chouse of lashesu201d. u201ciconicu201d is my favorite set. so receiving a mini in the mail was quite disappointing.

reviews.review_text: The lashes GIVE. A step above natural but nothing too wild or out there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these lashes. Look at them - they're gorgeous. (If I'm wearing lashes, I'm go big or don't bother) But more importantly, they have a great band that takes glue well and makes application much easier and more successful. Really well made and beautiful. Not subtle, but who says lashes need to be quiet. They open up your eyes beautifully!

reviews.review_text: Definitely recommend it. It looks good on my small deep set eyes. I have used it 4 times already and I believe I can use it at least 4-5 more times as it seems very good quality and durable.

reviews.review_text: Favorite all time lash.  I have almond shape eyes and these lashes really accentuate my eyes and just gives me that it factor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got the iconic mini and I am OBSESSED! I have small almond eyes and these fit me perfectly! I didnu2019t need to tweak them at all. They are the perfect level of drama to have your lashes looking extra and elegant at the same time. I am new to lashes but they were not bad to put on and they make me look like THAT GIRL like if Iu2019m wearing a til too filter or something. They are STUNNING. Will repurchase for sure. I conic id definitely the right name for them. They do feel a little heavy at first if youu2019re new to lashes but your eyes get used to them after a few minutes :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Theyu2019re really pretty but personally the band is a little too thick! Theyu2019re beautiful, especially for the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The band is too thick and not flexible. I donu2019t understand the hype around this brand.

reviews.review_title: Best value and durability on the market!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a fan of House of lashes since the pandemic. I have tried many strip lashes from Adelle to the premium human hair lashes and these are by far the best value and durability I have had. This is especially true if you are like me and forget to take them off till late night and leave them in random places and have to wash them after the literal dust has settled. The mini are great because I don't have to cut them and I am a lazy lash girl.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: these were my #1 lashes for the past couple years. they are the perfect fit, flexible band, amazing shape, etc., but my last 10+ pairs have come in like they are random lashes packed together. the shape of the hairs isn't the same either. extremely disappointed as these were my favorite lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time wearing lashes but theyu2019re beautiful!  They made my eyes look great added length. Need more practice but they are wispy and beautiful .

reviews.review_title: What glamour gal DOESN'T want to wear falsies?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had considered myself tragically inept when it came to applying false eyelashes. Not anymore! The band is thick but flexible, and not having to cut, just glue and apply! I have used a pair for practice, and it is holding up well, just a gentle cleansing to remove glue and mascara. I am stocking up on these, and you can't beat the sale price!

reviews.review_text: Love em. Stayed on all night. No need to reapply glue and didn't make eyes watery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The fact that these lashes are $6 here is amazing! On HOL Website they're $12 or $10 if u buy a pack of 3! I have hooded shaped almond eyes and wear both Iconic & Iconic Lites! I recommend Iconic LITES if you wear winged liner a lot and have *smaller, hooded eyes, and I recommend regular Iconics for bigger hooded eyes, or if you drag your eyeshadow out in the outer crease. I cant speak on any other eye shape but for my hooded eye people I think you'll LOVE this style! The lashes are light weight with a thick band. I never experience shedding and they're resuseable. I used to think I couldn't wear lashes cause of my eyes until I found this brand! House of Lashes holds a special place in my heart and Iconic lites were LITERALLY my first pair of lashes ive ever owned lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these lashes!! They give the dramatic look I was looking for and Iu2019ve been able to wear them serval times!
jet adore Mes yeux petits tu me donnes une grandeur avec un beau maquillage

I cut them to my eye length and once I glued them on, the very thick band was bothering me and it opened up my eye so much that it looked like abnormal and creepy. Not only was the band uncomfortable but it was very hard to look at. If you have smaller eyes I dont recommend this but something with a thin band/clear bandopened up my eue

reviews.review_text: Best lashes Iu2019ve ever used in my life! Itu2019s interesting how I can also call myself spoiled and have used hundreds of lashes, but nothing looks better on selfies and photoshoots than these lashes! Iu2019m in love and shocked by the durability of these lashes. Iu2019ve worn them for 6 months now and theyu2019re still holding well. How do these people even make money? I hope the quality stays this way. I will post pics. I am stocking up on these they are fire! Btw - I do NOT model for these people and donu2019t work for them. Have not spoken to them, just here to tell the truth. They didnu2019t give me a free pair and I bought these lashes with my own money. Iu2019m IG: Taoleeonig

Not suitable for daytime but I could see myself wearing these at the club since they'd definitely stand out on darker settings. 4/5 because the band is so thick and inflexible...I didn't like working with them
